com.uber.m3.tally

Interface Scope

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public interface Scope
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable
    A namespace wrapper around a stats reporter, ensuring that all emitted values have a given prefix or set of tags.
